titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the age for required mandatory distributions from retirement accounts, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Keeping Your Retirement Act of 2021
This bill increases from 72 to 75 the age for mandatory distributions from tax-exempt retirement plans.
